item.title: :rocket: Products
item.description: This page introduces my developed software products. Most of them are command-line tools and libraries for researchers and developers.

item.title: oinkie
item.description: The software birthmark toolkit for LLVM IR.

item.title: :dog: pochi
item.description: Java birthmark toolkit, detecting the software theft by native characteristics of the programs.
